snippet: Growing up in Zimbabwe and visiting South Africa as a young woman helped forge Danai Gurira's passion for producing theater in Africa....

headline.print_headline: Growing Up in Africa Impacts 'Walking Dead' Actor
headline.main: Growing Up in Africa Impacts 'Walking Dead' Actor

lead_paragraph: Growing up in Zimbabwe and visiting South Africa as a young woman helped forge Danai Gurira's passion for producing theater in Africa.
